IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_character_inventory_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_inventory_info GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_character_inventory_info @character_id dbo.id_t, @inven_type dbo.code_t, @isCashSlot TINYINT, @count TINYINT
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF @isCashSlot = 1 BEGIN UPDATE Character_Inventory_Infos SET cash_count = @count WHERE character_id = @character_id AND inven_type = @inven_type END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE Character_Inventory_Infos SET free_count= @count WHERE character_id = @character_id AND inven_type = @inven_type END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
